text: As Life & Style exclusively reported, Kylie Jenner secretly married Travis Scott in a small ceremony at her Calabasas mansion — but most of the 19 - year - old's famous family didn't even know about it! An insider reveals that the beauty mogul was scared about how her mom and siblings would react to the news. ` ` Kendall [ Jenner ] is the only family member Kylie told. Kylie feels like she's grown, and this is her way of breaking off from the family — especially from [ momager ] Kris,'' the insider explains.
